title: WTB: N172 Old Judge (Read for Players)
author: shernan30

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Old Judge (Read for Players)
posts.post_content:
I'm expanding my Columbus Old Judge set this year to include any player that played on the Columbus Buckeyes (1883-1884) or Columbus Solons (1889-1891). I've only been getting cards that have the team listed as Columbus.

So, to get this started I'd like to add a card of a player or manager who played for the Buckeyes. Here is the list:

[STRIKE]Patsy Cahill (John Francis)[/STRIKE]
Rudy Kemmler (Rudolph)
[STRIKE]Fred Mann[/STRIKE]
Gus Schmelz

An overview of condition I look for:

  * Graded or Raw (I buy the card not so much the grade)
  * Strong image is always best
  * Trimming to a minimum (must have advertisement)
  * Rebacked okay
  * No skinned cards


Pm or email, shernan30@gmail, any scans and prices.

Steven
